thread.title: Blue Ivy Carter wore a perfect tiny pink suit at the Grammys
thread.title_full: Blue Ivy Carter wore a perfect tiny pink suit at the Grammys

author: Laura Vitto
title: Blue Ivy Carter wore a perfect tiny pink suit at the Grammys
text:
Forget all the truly horrible looks out there at Sunday night's Grammy Awards and turn your attention to the best dressed person at the show: Blue Ivy Carter.
The daughter of BeyoncÃ© and Jay Z sat on her dad's lap and next to Aunt Solange in her perfect pink suit to watch the show.
SEE ALSO: BeyoncÃ©'s big announcement gave an incredible start to Black History Month
Image: Getty Images for NARAS
Image: Kevin Mazur/Getty Images
Worth noting: The internet is pretty sure Blue's shirt is a nod to the iconic ruffled shirt Prince wore on the Purple Rain album cover.

And, in an extremely adorable coincidence, Schoolboy Q's little girl also wearing a perfect pink suit.
This is the only red carpet trend we're here for.
UR MANS SCHOOLBOY Q
CAME WITH HIS DAUGHTER
HAD HER IN A PINK GUCCI SUIT
AND HIS HOODIE
BEST DRESSED CONTENDER #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/vW4otiDFLm
